name: AthensSermonsfromAULCMinistries
0:
”Alexa, open athens sermons”
”Alexa, ask athens sermons for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start athens sermons”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: athens sermons
des: Listen to the latest sermons from Rev. Dr. Rob White from the A U L C Ministries. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next sermons by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
